title: U. S. Army Veteran 3-Season Jacket
features: 100% taslon nylon shell w/microfleece lining & lightweight polyfill insulation
Embroidered at our facilities in Scottsboro, AL
Officially Licensed by the United States Military
Supports the Morale Welfare, and Recreation (MWR) Programs of the the U.S. Military
description: MilitaryBest is proud to offer this fine U. S. Army Veteran 3-Season Jacket. This U. S. Army Veteran 3-Season Jacket is made from a 3-Layer system consisting of a nylon shell, an insulator layer, Nylon-lined sleeves, and an inside layer of fleece for comfort. The 3-Season Jacket features include a sturdy black enamel front-zipper, raglan sleeves, outsize zip pockets, an inside zip security pocket, YKK zippers, and a banded-bottom. This U. S. Army Veteran 3-Season Jacket will make an excellent addition to your wardrobe, or a fine gift. Your satisfaction is guaranteed! Depending on your location this 3-Season Jacket can be worn in fall, winter, and spring. This 3-Season Jacket is custom embroidered at our facilities in Scottsboro, AL.
